mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (notice_no, cust_id, comment_content, comment_date) VALUES (#{noticeNo}, #{custId}, #{commentContent}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, comment_date = NOW() WHERE comment_no = #{commentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT comment_no AS commentNo, notice_no AS noticeNo, cust_id AS custId, comment_content AS commentContent, comment_date AS commentDate FROM comment WHERE comment_no = #{commentNo}
SELECT comment_no AS commentNo, notice_no AS noticeNo, cust_id AS custId, comment_content AS commentContent, comment_date AS commentDate FROM comment ORDER BY comment_date DESC

SELECT comment_no AS commentNo, notice_no AS noticeNo, cust_id AS custId, comment_content AS commentContent, comment_date AS commentDate FROM comment WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo} ORDER BY comment_date DESC

SELECT comment_no AS commentNo, notice_no AS noticeNo, cust_id AS custId, comment_content AS commentContent, comment_date AS commentDate FROM comment WHERE comment_content LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, ''), '%') ORDER BY comment_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE comment_content LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{searchKeyword}, ''), '%')
